creator: Merge Puzzle Games
descriptionHtml:
⭐POP NUMBER BUBBLES IN THE EXCITING WORLD OF COLORFUL BUBBLES: Match Colors, Merge Numbers, Shoot Bubbles, Solve Puzzles, Relax while Train your Brain!

💎Bubble Shooter Number Pop is the classic and most attractive number bubble game for FREE! Shoot and merge number bubbles to blast your way through endless challenging number levels!

🎮HOW TO PLAY BUBBLE SHOOTER NUMBER POP, THE CLASSIC BUBBLE SHOOTER GAME?
★ Aim the same number bubbles;
★ Tap bubble shooter to switch the number bubble with your puzzle-solving strategy;
★ Merge same numbers to a bigger number (2048 and up to 1 million);
★ Making COMBOs will reach higher number levels faster. So better use your strategy!

👑FEATURES OF BUBBLE SHOOTER NUMBER POP, THE CLASSIC MERGE NUMBER GAME
● Easy to play. Just tap, shoot and merge;
● Challenging and addictive. Once you start to pop bubbles, you can’t stop;
● Classic number merge game, suitable to all ages;
● Multiple theme pictures with exquisite image quality;
● No WIFI is needed;
● Free to download! Play and enjoy Bubble Shooter for free!

🕹️EASY AND FUN TO PLAY
◾No pressure and no steps limit;
◾Various interesting elements and free great prizes;
◾Brand new powerful boosters available to win the best score;
◾Plentiful bubble materials, i.e. balloon, football, lemon and smoothie, etc.

🪙Have fun receiving COINS with Bubble Shooter Number Pop, the classic puzzle game! Relax and exercise your brain by winning beautiful themes and medals. Build your own colorful world with plentiful number bubbles made of various materials.

🏆Let’s start the OFFLINE & FREE casual bubble pop game, and become a legendary bubble shooter!
descriptionShort: Pop number bubbles to merge. Play this classic Bubble Shooter game to relax.
